channel.title: Alison Urie on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Alison Urie on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Imagining the Future: public debate part two
item.description: LR - Lesley Riddoch JM - Jackie McLeod AU - Alison Urie BH - Bob Hamilton As part of the Iriss, Imagining The Future of Social Services project, led by Robert Rae, a series of creative events were held in Govan over May 2014, to explore aspirations for the future from a locality perspective and to think about the changes that need to be made now and in the coming years.
